title: Oatmeal and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['115g butter', '100g caster sugar', '75g soft brown sugar', '130g peanut butter', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '125g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '40g oats', '170g dark chocolate chips']
